name: Microsoft OneDrive Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft OneDrive Trigger 节点。主要用于: Trigger for Microsoft OneDrive API.

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | 默认值: fileCreated
available_options: File Created (值: fileCreated) - When a new file is created
File Updated (值: fileUpdated) - When an existing file is modified
Folder Created (值: folderCreated) - When a new folder is created
Folder Updated (值: folderUpdated) - When an existing folder is modified

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

watchFolder.name: watchFolder
watchFolder.description: Whether to watch for the created folder in a given folder, rather than the entire OneDrive
watchFolder.natural_language_description: 参数名: Watch Folder | 作用: Whether to watch for the created folder in a given folder, rather than the entire OneDrive | 默认值: False

watch.name: watch
watch.description: How to select which folder to watch
watch.natural_language_description: 参数名: Watch | 作用: How to select which folder to watch | 默认值: anyFolder
available_options: Any Folder (值: anyFolder) - Watch for updated folders in the entire OneDrive
Inside a Folder (值: selectedFolder) - Watch for updated folders inside a selected folder
A Selected Folder (值: oneSelectedFolder) - Watch a specific folder for updates

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: The file to operate on. The 'By URL' option only accepts URLs that start with 'https://onedrive.live.com'.
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File | 作用: The file to operate on. The 'By URL' option only accepts URLs that start with 'https://onedrive.live.com'. | 默认值: {'mode': 'id', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

folderId.name: folderId
folderId.description: The folder to operate on. The 'By URL' option only accepts URLs that start with 'https://onedrive.live.com'.
folderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder | 作用: The folder to operate on. The 'By URL' option only accepts URLs that start with 'https://onedrive.live.com'. | 默认值: {'mode': 'id', 'value': '', 'cachedResultName': ''} | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: folderChild (值: None) - Whether to look for modified files/folders in all nested folders, rather than only direct descendants
